/.title: Forinov, the social network for Open Innovation
/.description: Forinov is the social network for open innovation that connects startups, companies and partners to facilitate their collaboration. Forinov optimizes monitoring, sourcing and portfolio management of startups and partners.

/startups.title: Register on Forinov, the first social network that connects innovation actors
/startups.description: How to register on Forinov if I am a start-up? How do I apply for an opportunity if I am a start-up? Discover the features of Forinov, the first social network for Open Innovation

/corporations.title: Register your company on Forinov, the first social network for innovation
/corporations.description: How to register your company on Forinov? How to create an opportunity? With Forinov, discover the best Open Innovation startups, create opportunities, manage your collaborations.

/partners.title: Register on Forinov, steps to create your partner profile
/partners.description: How to register on Forinov, the first social network for Open Innovation? How to launch / create an opportunity? Discover the features of Forinov, the leading network for innovation actors.

/solutions/startups.title: Forinov, create your startup profile for free
/solutions/startups.description: Forinov, connects the best startups with companies looking for solutions, allows them to apply for opportunities (calls for projects, calls for applications, partner programs...) and simplifies customer relationships. More than a prospecting solution, it is a business network!

/solutions/corporations.title: Forinov, the most complete solution for open innovation
/solutions/corporations.description: More than a social network for Open Innovation, Forinov is the best open innovation solution for companies looking to innovate: startups and partners’ directories, monitoring solution, qualification and sourcing of startups, management of calls for projects and portfolio monitoring...

/solutions/partners.title: Forinov, the largest network of innovation partners
/solutions/partners.description: Whether you are an incubator or an investor, join the largest network of innovation actors on Forinov. Create your profile to introduce your offers and services, develop your network, publish your calls for projects or simplify the management of your startups and partners’ portfolio.

/about.title: Forinov, About us
/about.description: About Forinov, the first social network for Open Innovation. How was the idea born, what is the concept and the ambition of Forinov?

/directories/startups.title: Forinov's startup directory - tech and innovative startups
/directories/startups.description: Forinov, start-ups directory. Thanks to the search engine by categories, technologies or sectors of activity, find the best startups classified by field. More than a mapping or a database of startups, join the largest network of startups and their qualified profiles, data updated in real time by the teams (fundraising, staff ... and key indicators ...)
